render(PImage) - Method in class mappingtools.BezierWarp
BezierWarp has one method (.render) renders both the sprites (keyboard "c") and the transformed image
render(PImage, float, float, float, float) - Method in class mappingtools.ClusterBezierWarp
renders the transformed image
render(PImage) - Method in class mappingtools.FreeWarp
freeWarp has one method (.render) renders both the sprite (keyboard "c") and the transformed image
render(PImage) - Method in class mappingtools.QuadWarp

renderEdges() - Method in class mappingtools.ClusterBezierWarp
edge blending masks
renderMask() - Method in class mappingtools.ClusterBezierWarp
ClusterBezierWarp has 4 methods (.sprites, .renderMask, .renderEdges and .render) renders the mask
